alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 8:18AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Central and northern Carbon county, including Rawlins and Elk Mountain. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills
